query: SELECT oe.id, t.nome as tema, LEFT(oe.descricao, 50) as descricao_preview FROM ocorrencias_estruturais oe LEFT JOIN temas_ocorrencias t ON oe.temaId = t.id;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2rEtBRZHWZUfGJS.3b07a01772f8 --database 3c9MozLH35e233uWy5WDtH --execute SELECT oe.id, t.nome as tema, LEFT(oe.descricao, 50) as descricao_preview FROM ocorrencias_estruturais oe LEFT JOIN temas_ocorrencias t ON oe.temaId = t.id;
